title: Stochastic Optimization of Production Planning
container-title: Operations Research
items.abstract: <jats:p> A multistage decision problem is optimized using a new formulation of stochastic dynamic programming. The problem optimized in this paper concerns a semiconductor production process where the transitions at each work station are stochastic. The mathematical model employs at one stage a Markov decision process with an infinite number of substages and shows how this process may be compressed and handled as one stage in the larger problem. </jats:p>

title: Seminar on the Administrative Aspects of Educational Planning
container-title: The Journal of Modern African Studies
items.abstract: <jats:p>The latest C.A.F.R.A.D. seminar dealt with an urgent issue in Africa today, for almost everywhere education is one of the main priorities and educational administration one of the main problems. Over 40 civil servants, with wide specialist knowledge and responsibilities, came from 26 different African states; there were seven senior educationalists from Morocco—a sign of the importance attached by the local Government both to the seminar and to C.A.F.R.A.D.</jats:p>
